text: Mr Low is a kind and understanding teacher. He teaches us how to do difficult questions and helps us when we do not know how to do them. He gives us small tests every week to help us improve. He not only teaches us how to deal with the questions in the exam, but also how to manage our time well in the exam. -TIMOTHY

Mr Low is a very very nice and understanding teacher. He is very patient when you do not know how to do a question, he will give understanding explanations and does not give lectures like other teachers. If you need help for math I strongly encourage you to join Trinity Learning Centre üòÅ

Mr Low is funny yet stern, engages the kids, is encouraging and clear in his explanation.

Can see improvement in problem solving in my child within a few months.

Thanks, Mr Low.

The environment is very nice..my child always looks forward to the class...the teacher has good subject knowledge and explains nicely to make sure that everyone understands the thing...he makes the maths so interesting that my child started loving the subject...

Mr Low is a kind, patient and gentle teacher. My results has improved ever since I joined Trinity Learning Centre.He is a humorous teacher who makes the classes fun and I look forward to attend his class every week. However, when it comes to completing homework, Mr Low is very particular about it. He can be very strict when it comes to serious work as he wants his students to be responsible for their own learning.
